: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus Prime: It's not your fault at all. What happened is just an outcome of the decision we made, you couldn't stop it from happening. Thank about the good things. The child you hold in your arms is our daughter, Nightlight. We have a family.
 "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> wrote:Nightlight:

"I didn't help..."replied nightlight "If I were coming back to base 
when I felt bad this wouldn't haven't happen... we lost the new 
member, perhaps they join to the enemy"
